sentences.sContent: Economic concerns are foremost on many voters’ minds.
sentences.sCn: 经济是许多选民关心的首要问题。

sentences.sContent: Rostropovich was long considered the world’s foremost cellist.
sentences.sCn: 长期以来，罗斯特罗波维奇一直被视为世界上首屈一指的大提琴家。

sentences.sContent: ...the most important character doctor should have is professional ethics that is the foremost way to gain trust from patients...
...Architecture is first and foremost about thinking...

trans.tranOther: in a leading position among a group of people or things
